details.name: Function
details.value:
1. K823 Control system, Adjustable temperature, FM radio, CD connection, Telephone receiver, Steam bath, Ozone, Top light, Wall lamp.
2. Water massage, Cold and Hot water inlet, Cold and Hot, Top shower, Acupuncture nozzles, Movable shower, Exhaust fan.
3. Voltage: 210~240V, Total power: 4KW

details.name: Packing & Weight
details.value:
carton with wooden cases packing
G.W: 323 KG N.W.: 249 KG Package size: 3.21 CM
